  16. /*
  17. * NGX_MAX_ALLOC_FROM_POOL should be (ngx_pagesize - 1), i.e. 4095 on x86.
  18. * On Windows NT it decreases a number of locked pages in a kernel.
  19. */
  20. ‌#define NGX_MAX_ALLOC_FROM_POOL  (ngx_pagesize - 1)
